 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גְּרַם‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==bone== (Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גֶּ֫רֶם‎</span>; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 46</sup>); — plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּרְמֵיהוֺן‎</span> [[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]].
